title: Japan Uncovered
inclusions_evidence: “Return airfares from Auckland to Japan PLUS ... 18-day fully inclusive tour with Wendy Wu Tours from Osaka to Tokyo, twin share”; “15-nights accommodation 15 Breakfasts, 14 Lunches, 15 Dinners Touring with Guides and entrance fees”

flights.assumed_route: Roundtrip Auckland (AKL) to Japan (Osaka KIX or Tokyo NRT/HND) matching tour dates (approx depart 05 May 2026, return 26 May 2026 — 18-day tour window inferred from page text)

other.notes: DIY component prices (flights, hotels, meals, tours, transfers) could not be reliably fetched during this run; numeric DIY component prices therefore set to null.

reasoning: Package includes return international flights from Auckland, an 18-day fully escorted Wendy Wu tour (Osaka to Tokyo), 15 nights accommodation and most meals and entrance fees — strong inclusions for travellers prioritizing convenience and guided experiences. However the absolute per-person price is high and I could not verify DIY flight + 15-night independent-booking costs due to inability to fetch live supplier pricing in this session, so I cannot quantify savings.
additional_notes: I attempted to fetch live DIY component prices but the web-fetch step failed; if you want precise savings calculations I can re-run live searches (flights on OTAs and hotels on booking platforms) and update numeric DIY totals and savings.
